<<header |=Installing Ocsigen>>

All Ocsigen packages are available via [[https://opam.ocaml.org/|opam]], the OCaml package manager.

===Full-stack Web and mobile apps

For client-server applications with mobile support, start with [[wiki("ocsigen-start"):|Ocsigen Start]]:
{{{
$ opam install ocsigen-start
}}}
Then read the [[wiki("tuto"):latest/manual/basics|getting started guide]].

===Server-side websites

For traditional websites with minimal client-side code, [[wiki("eliom"):|Eliom]] alone is enough:
{{{
$ opam install ocsipersist-sqlite-config eliom
}}}
See the [[wiki("tuto"):latest/manual/basics-server|server-side programming documentation]].

===More resources

Browse all [[wiki("tuto"):|tutorials]] to find the best starting point for your project.
